entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
